<letter id='abl441'>
<recipient first='William' last='Seward' type='individual'/>
<p>
TO SECRETARY SEWARD.
</p><p>
<a href='/results.php?city=washington' rel='city origin'>WASHINGTON</a>, May 9, <a href="/results.php?year=1863">1863</a>
</p><p>
I believe Mr. L. is a good man, but two things need to be remembered.
</p><p>
1st. Mr. R.'s rival was a relative of Mr. L.
</p><p>
2d. I hear of nobody calling Mr. R. a "Copperhead," but Mr. L. However, let us watch.
</p>
<p><a href="/results.php?tla=abl" rel="me">A. L.</a></p>
</letter>
